title: S4 Ep4: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 2 – Trailer Park Troubles
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 2 – Trailer Park Troubles
description:
September 19, 2019 / Rebecca Lavoie hosts with guests Susan Simpson, Rabia Chaudry, and Erica Suter, discussing episode 2 of the series and the impact of inconsistencies in witness statements.
 
Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
